original_text: When Jesus had finished saying these things, he left Galilee and went into the region of Judea to the other side of the Jordan.
korean_text: 예수께서 이 말씀을 마치시고 갈릴리를 떠나 요단 강 건너 유대 지경에 이르시니

sentences.original_text: When Jesus had finished saying these things
and went into the region of Judea
to the other side of the Jordan
